events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the product as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves a refund due to receiving an incorrect product. Assigning cluster as Refund.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund because you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product delivered to me.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund for the full purchase amount. You should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund initiation. I appreciate the prompt help resolving this issue.
The refund case has been resolved successfully and the customer has been notified about the refund process completion.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I confirmed the refund arrived today. Thank you very much for your assistance and follow-up!
Closing this refund case as resolved since the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and expressed satisfaction.
